Package utility.logging

Class ApplicationLogger

  • java.lang.Object
    • utility.logging.ApplicationLogger
  • public final class ApplicationLogger
extends Object
    A Logger for Console or File output. Logs LoggingLevel.INFO by default

    • Method Detail

      • setConsoleLoggingLevel

        public static void setConsoleLoggingLevel​(LoggingLevel loggingLevel)
        Determines whether the log entries are output to the console.
        Parameters:
        loggingLevel - the LoggingLevel for the console

      • setDebugMode

        public static void setDebugMode​(boolean debugEnabled)
        Determines whether debug information (e.g. stacktrace of exceptions) are displayed on the console.
        Parameters:
        debugEnabled - true, if all available information is to be displayed on the console

      • setLogFilePath

        public static void setLogFilePath​(String logFileDirectory)
        Specifies whether and where to store the log file(s).
        Parameters:
        logFileDirectory - a Path (Empty string for the execution path) to a Directory or null if no file should be created. Default is "log"

      • logInformation

        public static void logInformation​(String informationMessage)
        Logs a simple Information-String with the INFO-Tag and a Time-Stamp
        Parameters:
        informationMessage - the Message to log

      • logWarning

        public static void logWarning​(String warningMessage)
        Logs a simple Warning-String with the WARNING-Tag and a Time-Stamp.
        Parameters:
        warningMessage - the Message to log

      • logError

        public static void logError​(String errorMessage)
        Logs a simple Error-String with the ERROR-Tag and a Time-Stamp.
        Parameters:
        errorMessage - the Message to log

      • logException

        public static void logException​(Throwable exception,
                                LoggingLevel exceptionLoglevel,
                                LoggingLevel messageLoglevel)
        Logs an Throwable with a Time-Stamp. Additionally, a seperate LoggingLevel for the console output can be secified.
        Parameters:
        exception - the occurred Throwable
        exceptionLoglevel - the LoggingLevel for the Throwable
        messageLoglevel - the LoggingLevel for the console output of the Throwable message

      • logException

        public static void logException​(Throwable exception,
                                LoggingLevel exceptionAndMessageLoglevel)
        Logs a Throwable with a Time-Stamp.
        Parameters:
        exception - The occurred Throwable
        exceptionAndMessageLoglevel - The LoggingLevel for the Throwable

      • logFileInformation

        public static void logFileInformation​(String fileInformationMessage)
        Logs a simple Information-String with the FILE-INFO-Tag and a Time-Stamp
        Parameters:
        fileInformationMessage - the Message to log

      • logMessage

        static void logMessage​(LoggingLevel logFileLevel,
                       String logFileMessage,
                       LoggingLevel consoleLevel,
                       String consoleMessage)
        Outputs a message to the console and saves it to a file (depending on the configuration)
        Parameters:
        logFileLevel - A LoggingLevel to Tag the Message as Info, Warning, etc. for the LogFile
        logFileMessage - The message for the log File
        consoleLevel - A LoggingLevel to Tag and filter the Message for the console output
        consoleMessage - The message for the console output
